content: You have entered a circular map. In the following questions, I will tell you what items are on the map, as well as your position and movements. You need to tell me the item you find after your movements. Please provide only the name of the item. Note that your answer should include only the name of the item and no other words.

You have been given a circular path consisting of 10 connected dots. At the start, you are positioned on the dot that is located at the top of the path, where you find an oboe. Moving in a clockwise direction from the oboe, the elements on the path are a baseball, a bell pepper, a tights, a Christmas stocking, a brass, a pizza, a meerkat, an eastern diamondback rattlesnake, and a spoonbill. Starting from the Christmas stocking, you move around the ring by 9 steps in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 8 steps in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 4 steps in a clockwise direction. What will you find?

Starting from the Christmas stocking, you move around the ring by 9 steps in a clockwise direction. This brings you to the brass. Then, you move around the ring by 8 steps in a clockwise direction. This takes you to the pizza. Finally, you move around the ring by 4 steps in a clockwise direction. This brings you back to the oboe. Therefore, what you will find is an oboe.
